sentences.english: That leaves in Fuji series starring this is the first time.
sentences.chinese: 相叶在富士的连续剧主演这次是第一次。

sentences.english: He watched soap operas all afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 他整个下午都在看连续剧。

sentences.english: 10 years later, he started preparing for that remake of the classic TV series .
sentences.chinese: 10年后，他开始筹备重拍那部经典的电视连续剧。

sentences.english: It is Billie Piper in 1984 China Central Television TV series.
sentences.chinese: 那是一九八四年中央电视台筹拍电视连续剧。

sentences.english: She is the wife of Simpson, the America's longest-running prime time TV show.
sentences.chinese: 她是美国最长的电视连续剧《辛普森家族》中的妻子。

sentences.english: Plans are to transition Zombieland into a half-hour weekly comedy series.
sentences.chinese: 将电影制作成半小时一集的喜剧连续剧，每周放映。

sentences.english: This 20-part TV series focuses on the conflict between Chinese and Western culture.
sentences.chinese: 这部20集电视连续剧集中表现中西文化的冲突。

sentences.english: They are nuts about TV serials.
sentences.chinese: 他们非常爱看电视连续剧。

sentences.english: She was very beautiful in this series and cooperated with Show Luo.
sentences.chinese: 在这部连续剧中，她非常漂亮，并且和罗志祥合作。

sentences.english: The TV station is airing reruns of my favorite soap opera.
sentences.chinese: 该电视台正在播放我最爱的连续剧重播。

sentences.english: They decided not to cast the mini-series with big-name actors.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定不给这部小型连续剧选派名演员。

sentences.english: Among the more unexpected of them is the following proposal for a television series.
sentences.chinese: 人们更加没有想到的一条就是有关电视连续剧的提议。

sentences.english: This weekend I finished watching the first season of "Heroes", a new TV series from the US.
sentences.chinese: 周末一口气把美国连续剧《英雄》第一季全看完了。

sentences.english: The first is the number of cancellations of soap operas.
sentences.chinese: 第一个趋势是大部分连续剧的解约。

sentences.english: The other is a television series" Kangxi Dynasty" in Kangxi.
sentences.chinese: 另一个是电视连续剧《康熙王朝》里的康熙。
